commands.name: az account management-group subscription add
commands.summary: Add a subscription to a management group.
examples: az account management-group subscription add --name GroupName --subscription Subscription

commands.name: az account management-group subscription remove
commands.summary: Remove an existing subscription from a management group.
examples: az account management-group subscription remove --name GroupName --subscription Subscription

commands.name: az account management-group subscription show
commands.summary: Show the details of a subscription under a known management group.
examples: az account management-group subscription show --name GroupName --subscription Subscription

commands.name: az account management-group subscription show-sub-under-mg
commands.summary: Get the subscription under a management group.
examples: az account management-group subscription show-sub-under-mg --name GroupName
